short_summary: Design and Construction of the Canada Pavilion for the World Hydrogen Summit 2024 in Rotterdam, The Netherlands
description: The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) is looking for a stand builder to finalise and finetune the existing preliminary design for the Canadian pavilion into a final design, and to build this pavilion at the World Hydrogen Summit 2024 (the Summit) conference and exhibition to be held in May 2024 in Rotterdam, The Netherlands.

full_summary:
**Canada Pavilion Design and Construction**
===========================

**Title:**
The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) invites bids for the design and construction of the Canada Pavilion at the World Hydrogen Summit 2024 in Rotterdam, The Netherlands.

**Notice Details:**
---------------

| Category | Description | Content |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Ref. Number | SolicitationNumber-numeroSollicitation | 24-263173 |
| Amendment | AmendmentNumber-numeroModification | 4 |
| Publication | PublicationDate-datePublication | 2024-03-26 |
| Closing Date | TenderClosingDate-appelOffresDateCloture | 2024-04-10 14:00:00 |
| Status | TenderStatus-appelOffresStatut-eng | Expired |

**Procurement Information:**
---------------------------

*   **Category:** CNST
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
*   **Selection Criteria:** Highest Technical Merit within a Stipulated Maximum Budget

**Project Overview:**
----------------

The Canada Pavilion aims to promote trade and investment opportunities between Canada and the Netherlands during the World Hydrogen Summit 2024. The pavilion's objectives include:

*   **Visibility and prominence** to Canada
*   **Showcasing Canadian organizations** in the hydrogen sector
*   **Providing a venue** for meetings, discussions, and information dissemination
*   **Promoting Canadian events** taking place during the Summit

**Attachments:**
---------------

Refer to the attached files for more information:

| --- | --- | --- |
| 1 | https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/34882/24-263173---addendum-1.pdf | Addendum 1 |
| 2 | https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/34882/24-263173---addendum-2.pdf | Addendum 2 |
| ... | ... | ... |

----------------------

*   **Name:** Eric Rainville
*   **Email:** [eric.rainville@international.gc.ca](mailto:eric.rainville@international.gc.ca)
*   **Phone:** (819) 918-8544
